Dear Sheffield City Council,
Could you please provide the following information regarding sports grounds regulated under the Safety of Sports Ground Act 1975 and Fire Safety and Safety of Places of Sport Act 1987
Q1. How many
a.	Designated sports grounds
b.	Sports grounds with Regulated Stands
do you have within your authority?
Q2. Number of special safety certificates issued per financial year between April 2018 and 30th September 2023?
Q3. How many SAG’s have been held for each sports ground identified in Q1 per financial year for the period April 2018 and 30th September 2023?
Q4. How many “during performance inspections” were undertaken each financial year for each sports ground in Q1 between April 2018 and 30th September 2023? Please break this down between normal sporting events under a current safety certificate and events under special safety certificate?
Q5. Which section/department within your local authority regulates sports grounds eg. Building Control, Environmental Health, Health and Safety team? If different sections/departments undertake work for this local authority function please list all and to what extent.
Q6. Does this team have designated sports ground safety officers or is this work shared amongst a number of staff.
Q7. Approximate FTE time spent on the regulation of sports grounds per financial year for the time period April 2018 and 30th September 2023?.
Q8. a. Does the local authority charge for work undertaken for the regulation of sports ground safety?
b.	If yes, is this on a set fee basis or based on a per hour charge?
c.	If you have one please provide a copy of your charging fees schedule or a link to it or advise if it is contained on your webpage?
Thank you.
Yours faithfully,
Dave James

Dear Dave James,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Safety of Sports
Ground Act 1985 which we received on 09/11/2023.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 07/12/2023. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council

Sheffield, S1 1UJ

Q5. Which section/department within your local authority regulates sports

team? If different sections/departments undertake work for this local
authority function please list all and to what extent.
Licensing
Q6. Does this team have designated sports ground safety officers or is
this work shared amongst a number of staff.
Designated Sports Grounds and Events Officer
Q7. Approximate FTE time spent on the regulation of sports grounds per
financial year for the time period April 2018 and 30th September 2023?.
2018/19: 0.5 FTE approx
2019/20: 0.5 FTE approx
2020/21: 0.5 FTE approx
2021/22: 0.5 FTE approx
2022/23: 0.5 FTE approx
2023/24: 0.5 FTE approx (estimated)
Q8. a. Does the local authority charge for work undertaken for the
regulation of sports ground safety?
No, unless the certificate holder formally requests work outside of the
normal annual certificate review process which would result in a change to
the general safety certificate.
b.      If yes, is this on a set fee basis or based on a per hour charge?
Per hour
c.      If you have one please provide a copy of your charging fees
schedule or a link to it or advise if it is contained on your webpage?
